```{r}
(x <- "alfa,bravo,charlie,delta")
#> [1] "alfa,bravo,charlie,delta"
strsplit(x, split = ",")
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "alfa"    "bravo"   "charlie" "delta"
```

```{r}
unlist(strsplit(x, split = ","))
#> [1] "alfa"    "bravo"   "charlie" "delta"

strsplit(x, split = ",")[[1]]
#> [1] "alfa"    "bravo"   "charlie" "delta"
```

```{r}
strsplit1 <- function(x, split) {
  strsplit(x, split = split)[[1]]
}
```

```{r}
load_all()
#> â„¹ Loading regexcite
```

```{r}
(x <- "alfa,bravo,charlie,delta")
#> [1] "alfa,bravo,charlie,delta"
strsplit1(x, split = ",")
#> [1] "alfa"    "bravo"   "charlie" "delta"
```

```{r}
exists("strsplit1", where = globalenv(), inherits = FALSE)
#> [1] FALSE
```
